summary.para: The GetICreateDevEnum method returns a pointer to the ICreateDevEnum interface. You can use the interface to create an enumerator for a category of filters, such as video capture devices or audio capture devices.
Note This method is deprecated. Instead, applications should call CoCreateInstance with CLSID_SystemDeviceEnum to create the System Device Enumerator.

param.name: ppEnum
param.para: Receives a pointer to the ICreateDevEnum interface. The caller must release the interface.

summary.para: The IFilterMapper3 interface extends the interface. The Filter Mapper object implements this interface.
